attributes.action: Call on Government to publish numbers of people who die after a Covid-19 Vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Various new vaccines with very little historical data regarding short and long term adverse side effects makes it essential we study every piece of data as soon as it is available. Calling on government to provide a duty of care by publicising side effects and deaths and working with the coroner to articulate post mortems especially to immediate family members.
attributes.background: Open transparency and discussion of data related to the adverse effects of Covid-19 vaccinations, especially amoung the over 60's

rejection.details: The Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency is already publishing data on the safety of Covid-19 vaccines, including reported side effects: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/latest-monitoring-data-confirms-safety-of-covid-19-vaccines
